doc:
Herschel Bernardi https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Herschel_Bernardi 0 Herschel Bernardi (October 30, 1923 – May 9, 1986) was an American actor and singer. He is best known for his supporting role in the drama television series Peter Gunn (1958–1961) and his leading role in the comedy television series Arnie (1970–1972). Two series earned him a Primetime Emmy Award nomination and two consecutive Golden Globe Award nominations. On stage, Bernardi appeared in many Broadway musicals. He was nominated for two Tony Awards for his performances in the original production of Zorba and the 1981 revival of Fiddler on the Roof. Herschel_Bernardi ( October_30_,_1923 – May_9_,_1986 ) was an_American_actor_and_singer . He is_best_known for his_supporting_role in the_drama_television_series_Peter_Gunn_(_1958 – 1961_) and his_leading_role in the_comedy_television_series_Arnie_(_1970 – 1972_) . Two_series earned him a_Primetime_Emmy_Award_nomination and two_consecutive_Golden_Globe_Award_nominations . On stage , Bernardi appeared in many_Broadway_musicals . He was_nominated for two_Tony_Awards for his_performances in the_original_production of Zorba and the_1981_revival of Fiddler on the_Roof .
